script: Summary Armand Junior Dongmo Notue is a highly skilled Data Scientist with expertise in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, and AI. He has proven ability to develop real-time AI solutions, deploy ML pipelines, and optimize predictive models to drive business impact. Key Skills and Experience Notue's skills include: NLP: Text Analytics, Sentiment Analysis, Text Summarization, Speech-to-Text, Word Embeddings Data Scientist and AI Trainer at Outlier (Contract), where he optimized AI models, improved accuracy by 15%, and collaborated in troubleshooting. Transformer-Based NLP Model for Sentiment Analysis: Achieved 88.3% accuracy Real-Time Fraud Detection System: Increased fraud detection accuracy by 35% He holds certifications from Harvard University, Google, and Deeplearning.AI, including Data Science and Machine Learning with Python, Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate, and Natural Language Processing Specialization. Professional Affiliations Notue is a member of the American Statistical Association (ASA), IEEE Computer Society, and Association for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence (AAAI).
